title: Agent Benchmark Evaluation Findings
description: Issues identified during evaluation of the Game Bench agent benchmark implementation. Overall score: 0.61 (Good). Key gaps: missing correctness calculation, no automated test harness, pangram detection bug.

title: Fix pangram detection bug
description: Line 290 in benchmark.ts identifies pangrams as words with length >= 7, but pangrams are words using ALL 7 letters. Should use isPangram() function instead of length check.
close_reason: Fixed: now uses isPangram() instead of length check

title: Add maxScore calculation for correctness metric
description: The guide defines correctness = rawScore / maxScore * 100, but the implementation doesn't calculate maxScore. Need to compute the theoretical maximum score for each puzzle by finding all valid words from the dictionary that match the puzzle constraints.
close_reason: Added calculateMaxScore() and correctness metric to benchmark output

title: Create automated benchmark harness
description: Create benchmark-all.ts that runs all 10 puzzles and aggregates results. Should output summary statistics across all puzzles for better evaluation coverage.

title: Add result persistence for trend analysis
description: Save benchmark results to JSON files with timestamps. Enable tracking performance over time and comparing different model/config combinations.

title: Add complexity stratification to puzzles
description: Add harder and easier puzzle variants. The evaluation skill recommends test sets spanning simple to complex levels. Currently all 10 puzzles are similar difficulty.

title: Add CI benchmark integration
description: Add GitHub Action to run benchmarks on PR. Track results over time and alert on regressions. Requires API keys as secrets.
